recipesJson.name: Fried Oreo
recipesJson.author: enzonik
recipesJson.description: This has been a very long-standing creation. I based this recipe around O’s Cookie. It’s a lighter chocolate taste that lacks most of the “alcohol-like” flavor that most chocolates give you. I added cookie to elevate the “cookie” aspect of this recipe. The combo of butter and vanilla made for the cream center. Joy turned it fried! You need time, a lot of it, 30-60 day steep, but WELL worth it. Definitely not a SNV recipe.

reviews.text: This knocks it out of the park for an oreo! I've been trying to make an oreo on my own but then I found this recipe and I love it! Thank you!
